kickstart.description: Install fail2ban on node with public connection
kickstart.post: # disable sending email everytime an event is triggered in fail2ban sed -i 's/\([ ]*sendmail-whois.*\)/#\1/' /etc/fail2ban/jail.conf

[DEFAULT] bantime = 900 ignoreip = 127.0.0.1/8 10.1.124.0/24
[sshd] enabled = true
# This file is part of the fail2ban-firewalld package to configure the use of # the firewalld actions as the default actions. You can remove this package # (along with the empty fail2ban meta-package) if you do not use firewalld # [DEFAULT] # banaction = firewallcmd-ipset
/usr/bin/systemctl enable fail2ban
